## Experimental.Formattable interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Interface for an object that can be formatted.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Formattable 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [format(format)](./ts-extras.experimental.formattable.format.md) | **_(BETA)_** Formats an object using the supplied mustache template. |
